caption.title: Analysis of 1PCTCO2 experiments (JJA seasonal means).
caption.p: ( A) Time series of multimodel average zonal mean temperature anomalies. ( B) Comparison of multimodel average midlatitude (25째N to 60째N) and high-latitude (65째N to 75째N) mean temperature anomalies. ( C) AA index defined as high-latitude minus midlatitude series including individual simulations shown (colored curves) and multimodel mean (black solid curve), along with linear trend (black dashed lines). ( D) QRA series for individual series and multimodel mean [conventions as in (C); see Materials and methods for details on scaling of QRA]. ( E) Projection of the QRA fingerprint onto zonal wind anomalies.
